meanings.definition: To cook food until it turns brown.
meanings.sent1: She browned the chicken in the oven.
meanings.sent2: The chef always browns the meat before adding the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The vegetables were surprised to be browned in the pan.
meanings.sent4: The sun browned the bread on the picnic table.
meanings.sent5: The fire gently browned the marshmallows to perfection.

meanings.sent2: The leaves on the tree were beautifully browned in autumn.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur looked comically browned after rolling in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The old book had browned pages from age and sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The once green banana had browned spots and was now sweet to eat.
